data.meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)
data.sentence: The word وَاللَّيْلِ comes from the root ل ي ل and is associated with the meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)

data.meanings: to be calm/quiet/still, be covered or spread out with darkness.
data.sentence: The word سَجَى comes from the root س ج و and is associated with the meanings: to be calm/quiet/still, be covered or spread out with darkness.
